name: Legal Case Study
description: A sample case demonstrating legal reasoning and jurisprudence-related coherence.

memories.content: In contract law, consideration is required for a legally binding agreement.
The Fourth Amendment protects citizens from unreasonable searches and seizures by the government.
In tort law, negligence requires a duty of care, breach of that duty, causation, and damages.
Legal precedent under the doctrine of stare decisis means that courts generally follow previous rulings.
The burden of proof in criminal cases is 'beyond a reasonable doubt,' while in civil cases it is 'preponderance of evidence.'
